1. New system: Treasure Cave. From the 11th level, you can explore them once per day. The higher the pass level is, 
the higher the chance to get advanced equipment is. The highest level has a 100% chance to get advanced equipment.
Tips, please keep the network is OK;
2. Reduces the difficulty of upgrading and reduces the number of monsters in each level;
3.Rings and amulet can generate attributes that increase experience gain;
4. Warrior spell adjustment:
1) The distance of charge increased by 1;
2) Increased Sunder Armor damage;
3) Increased Shirlwind damage;
5.Pass level 10 can activate follower: Sorcerer's Apprentice;

1. Modify the probability of obtaining equip:
Treasure chest:
Rare equip: 100% chance;
Epic equip: 10% chance;
Ring set: 2% chance;
Chance to gain 2 equip.
Boss:
Rare equip: 100% chance;
Epic equip: 40% chance;
Legendary equip: 4% chance;
Suit equip: 2% chance;
Get 2 equip at a time.

1.新增技能重置功能；
2.新增金币商城，现在可以直接使用金币解锁职业第二天赋和所有的佣兵；
3.现在穿戴装备不再要求角色等级；
4.装备升级功能修改：装备等级低于75级时，最多可升级的等级为当前角色等级+9级，装备等级达到75级之后，不再有角色等级限制；
5.现在出售升级后的装备可以返回一定数量的金币；
6.修复了bug。
